entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
